job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer who is passionate and has cybersecurity experience. The incumbent will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs, presenting to clients and more. Duties and ResponsibilitiesInterpret business requirements and technical specificationsDesign APIs to encompass service functionalityPerform coding to technical specificationsInvestigate, analyze and document reported defectsPerform maintenance programming and correction of identified defectsCreate and document and implement unit test plans, scripts, and test harnessesCreate and maintain technical documentation using defined technical documentation templatesParticipate in brainstorm sessions with the teamCo-lead presentations, demo our software and answer client questionsPerforms related duties as assignedSkills / Attributes RequiredMinimum of 5 years experienceSubstantial experience in C/C++ and C#Multithreading (concurrent) programming abilitiesSystem-level application/services programming experienceKnowledge of database architecture and designStrong object-oriented programming skills and design patternsInternationalization experience is a plusGood communication skills, team player and cooperativeAbility to interpret requirements and technical specifications.Ability to code software according to published standards and design guidelines.Flexible attitude, ability to perform under pressure.A commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the work.Ability to work well within a teamAbility to work with minimal supervision
